column3: is a linguistic website launched in [[1997]]
column4: concentrating on the languages of Tolkien in general. The website is maintained by [[Helge Fauskanger]].

column1: It has articles on both the better-known languages
column4: such as [[Telerin]] and [[Valarin]].  It also includes language courses and wordlists
column5: word-by-word analyses of the corpus and other miscellaneous articles.

column1: The name translates as "Of the languages of Arda".
